bibl.title: Gestures. Essays in Ancient History, Literature, and Philosophy Presented to Alan L. Boegehold on the Occasion of his Retirement and his Seventy-fifth Birthday

bibl.seg: SCAFURO A.C., When a Gesture was Misinterpreted: διδόναι τιτθίον in Menander's Samia.

Geoffrey W. BAKEWELL and James P. SICKINGER (Edd.), Gestures. Essays in Ancient History, Literature, and Philosophy Presented to Alan L. Boegehold on the Occasion of his Retirement and his Seventy-fifth Birthday (Oxford, 2003) pp. 113-135.
Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 76 (2004), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 2.
